:::config { "language": "php", "theme": "min-dark" }
'a';
'b'; // +1 [tl! reindex(+1)]
'c';
'd'; // -3 [tl! reindex(-3)]
// Have a little break... [tl! reindex(null)]
'e';
'f';
'g';
// Yada yada... [tl! reindex(null)]
'x'; // 24 [tl! reindex(24)]
'y';
'z';
:::expectation
